tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had the requirement of visiting a dental clinic and I am so happy to note down my experience with Dr Murali and his team.  First and foremost, the cleanliness and hygiene standards at the clinic is outstanding. The waiting area is tidy and well-maintained, and the dental treatment rooms are spotless. The dental professionals at the clinic are truly outstanding. Dr Murali is not only highly skilled and knowledgeable but also took the time to explain each step of the procedure, ensuring that I feel informed and at ease throughout the entire process. He was also attentive to the concerns and questions I had, and patiently addressed them.The dental staffs over there displayed genuine care and empathy, creating a warm and friendly atmosphere. They were considerate of my comfort and consistently checked in with me during the treatment to ensure I was doing well. This level of personalized attention made me feel valued as a patient and put me at ease.Furthermore, the clinic is having a  seamless appointment scheduling system. They are accommodating and flexible, making it convenient for me to find an appointment that fit my schedule. The waiting time was minimal, and the staff efficiently managed the flow of patients, respecting everyone's time.The overall experience at the dental clinic is excellent. They are  demonstratimg a commitment to providing high-quality dental care and exceptional customer service. Thanks to their expertise, professionalism, and compassionate approach, I left the clinic feeling satisfied and confident in the dental treatment I received.I highly recommend All Care Dental Care to  anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Checkup (General),
review: I have been coming to the clinic since 1994 and I knew late Dr jaykumar very well,very affable, sincere,and quality dentist, Dr Murali is no less compitant and I have been switched to Dr Murali no less competant , his old place on double road was good , but the present place is outstanding,lot of innovating items pleasing to the eyes,decor is good so the treatment should be I am coming for the first time to this place and ,I miss the ever smiling face of Dr jaykumar, I have no doubt that Dr Murali will keep his standards in proffesion as would as the decor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I simply must thank Dr. Murali for making my daughter's dental experience as painless as possible. She was feeling anxious while visiting the clinic, but the humble, friendly atmosphere and the way patients are treated with compassion nade her feel more confident. Dental hygiene being very important, regular checkups are mandatory, and this clinic is our go to clinic for its up-to-date technology, modern machines, equipment, needless to say most skilled and qualified doctor in all dental specialties!
I consulted Dr. Murali as one of my wisdom tooth‚Äôs had started decaying. He made sure i was comfortable throughout the process and the extraction was done in hardly 5mins.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We went to the doctor for crown fitting and he said that one tooth would require filling as well. Later we got to know that he charges us 2500 per filling in one tooth. Such a high rate was definitely not imaginable as we usually pay 500 per filling in one tooth.  He was even trying to get us do an x-ray. ** **** **** ** *** ****** ** *** ** ** ** ********* ****** ** *** * **** ***** He also filled a second tooth and said he is just "doing it simply" and if it falls off, we should not notice it. **** ** *** *** * ****** ********* ** ** *** ************* The second filling fell off within 2 hours *** *** *** ****** ** *******

****** ******* *** ******* ** **** *** *** ******** Visited for my mother's RCT, doctor was only interested in implants as that was more expensive. Promised 3 settings, wrapped up in 2 and ended up doing an unsatisfactory job on her teeth purely because I opted out of implants. Kept pushing for implants ******* ** ******** ******* *** ******* *** *** ******* ********** ** ***** ********. Extremely disappointed with the experience*  **** ****** *** * *** **** ******* ** ***** ******* ********** **** ** ***** ** *********

I called the clinic to check doctor‚Äôs availability and then visited once I got confirmation. Upon visiting, the doctor was not there. They are taking booking in the name of experienced doctors and some junior doctor is there to check the patients and is using the doctor‚Äôs prescription slip.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Sensitive Teeth,Tooth Decay,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Dental Cavities,
review: Doctor suggested root canal when all that was needed was filling. They even charged me extra for taking x-ray(which they haven't shared with me despite promising) without even informing me in advance. I would suggest anyone consulting him to go for a second opinion before investing thousands of rupees unnecessarily. Be careful of such doctors.

They start the treatment before telling you the cost or even explaining the process. Throughout the treatment they would come up with new issues and charge for the same. 
I have done tooth filling in several clinics never did I experience such pain. The staff do not handle the tools properly. I got a cut in my tongue while doing the tooth filling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Murali is a thorough professional, I have seen him since last 22 years, from his early days post his academic studies carefully nurtured by his father. His approach has been so caring,  he explains how the sequence treatment  would be. He has treated all my family members, my Dad who is 80 plus always prefers to be attended by him. He has earned  such a faith that we in our family do not worry  for any dental issue,  Dr.Murali would take care!!
